mapper.select: select * from user where email = #{email} and status = 'ACTIVE'
select u.*, IF(au.login_name is null, "0", "1") as auto_invest_status from user u left join auto_invest_plan au on au.login_name = u.login_name and au.enabled=1 where u.login_name = #{loginName}
select * from user where login_name = #{loginNameOrMobile} or mobile = #{loginNameOrMobile}
mapper.insert: insert into user (login_name, password, mobile, email, register_time, referrer, status, salt, channel, source) value(#{loginName}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{referrer}, #{status}, #{salt}, #{channel}, #{source})
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where login_name = #{loginName}

update user set email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime}, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, status = #{status}, referrer = #{referrer}, province = #{province}, city = #{city} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select login_name from user where login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%')
select login_name from user u where u.login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%') and exists(select * from user_role r where r.login_name = u.login_name and r.role = 'STAFF')
select distinct channel from user where channel is not NULL
select IFNULL(channel,'其他') from user group by channel order by channel desc
select * from user where province is NULL or province = '' order by register_time DESC limit 0,100

SELECT DISTINCT(u.mobile) FROM user u INNER JOIN account a ON a.`login_name` = u.`login_name` INNER JOIN invest iv on a.`login_name` = iv.`login_name` WHERE IF(LENGTH(identity_number)=18,SUBSTRING(identity_number,11,2),SUBSTRING(identity_number,9,2)) - DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%m') = 0 AND iv.`status`='SUCCESS';
select ifnull(count(*),0) from user where channel = #{channel}
